Take your placement cell to a new level

Ready to elevate your Graduate Placement Rate to new heights? Join us on a journey where excellence meets opportunity and become renowned for providing quality placements that set your students on the path to success.

Universities associated with us

More than 70 universities have partnered with us and witnessed a rise in their graduate placement rates. Our innovative platform connects talented students with a vast network of reputed companies and ensures a win-win situation for all. By collaborating with Hirekarma, universities gain a competitive edge by increasing their entry level requirements and achieving remarkable placement success.
